title: Stranded Broadway Casts Entertain The Delayed At LaGuardia
teaser: Nothing ruins travel like a delay. But NPR's Scott Simon says many those stuck at LaGuardia this week were in good company when the casts of Broadway's Aladdin and The Lion King broke out in song.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
